revision.text:
{{#template_params:Region|Reference_URLs (label=References)}} {{#cargo_declare:_table=Problem|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL|Region=Text|Description=Wikitext|parent=Integer|country=Text|state=Text|city=Text|coordinate=Coordinates}} {{#cargo_store:_table=Problem}} {{#template_display:_format=infobox}} {{#cargo_query: tables=Problem |fields=Description |where=Problem._pageID={{PAGEID}} |format=standard }}
==How we are measuring it?==
{{#measurement_values: {{{Problem Type}}} | {{PAGENAME}} }}
==Sub Problems of {{PAGENAME}}==

[{{fullurl:Special:AddProblem|parent={{PAGEID}} }} Add Sub Problem]



{{#cargo_query:tables=Problem=P,Upvote=U |join on=P._pageID = U.page_id |fields=P._pageName=Problem Name,P._pageID=page_id,CONCAT( LEFT( P.Description, 350 ), IF( LENGTH( P.Description ) > 200, '...', '' ) ) = Description,COUNT(U.vote_type)=Upvotes |where=P.parent={{PAGEID}} AND (U.vote_type IS NULL OR U.vote_type='up') |group by=P._pageName,P._pageID,P.Description |order by=Upvotes DESC |limit=5 |format=template |template=Show Sub Problems |named args=yes }}


==Solutions of {{PAGENAME}}==

[{{fullurl:Form:Solution}} Add a Solution]



{{#cargo_query:tables=Solution=S, Problem=P, Upvote=U |join on=S.Problems HOLDS P._pageName,S._pageID = U.page_id |fields=S._pageName=Solution Name,,S._pageID=page_id,S.How_this_works=Description,COUNT(U.vote_type)=Upvotes |where=S.Problems HOLDS '{{PAGENAME}}' AND (U.vote_type IS NULL OR U.vote_type='up') |group by=U.vote_type,S._pageName,S.How_this_works,S._pageID |order by=Upvotes DESC |limit=5 |format=template |template=Show Related Solutions |named args=yes }}

==Projects of {{PAGENAME}}==

[{{fullurl:Form:Project}} Add a Project]


{{#cargo_query:tables=Project=Pj, Problem=P, Upvote=U |join on=Pj.Problem HOLDS P._pageName,Pj._pageID = U.page_id |fields=Pj._pageName=Project Name,Pj._pageID=page_id,CONCAT( LEFT( Pj.Overview, 350 ), IF( LENGTH( Pj.Overview ) > 200, '...', '' ) ) = Overview, Pj.Feature_Image = Feature_Image,COUNT(U.vote_type)=Upvotes |where=Pj.Problem HOLDS '{{PAGENAME}}' AND (U.vote_type IS NULL OR U.vote_type='up') |group by=U.vote_type,Pj._pageName,Pj.Feature_Image,Pj.Overview,Pj._pageID |order by=Upvotes DESC |limit=5 |format=template |template=Show Related Projects |named args=yes }}

==Have something to say about this problem? == [[Category:Problem]]

{{#template_params:Name|Same As|Measurement|Effects(label=Results of {{PAGENAME}} )|Reference_URLs (label=References)}} {{#cargo_declare:_table=Problem_Type|Name=String|Same_As=List (,) of String|Measurement=List (,) of Page|Effects=List (,) of String|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL|Description=Wikitext}} {{#cargo_store:_table=Problem_Type}} {{#template_display:_format=infobox}} == Problem Description == {{#cargo_query: tables=Problem_Type |fields=Description |format=standard |where=Problem_Type._pageID={{PAGEID}} }} == How are we measuring? ==
{{#cargo_query:tables=Problem_Type=pt,Measurement=m |join on=m.Parameter_Name HOLDS pt.Measurement |fields=m.Parameter_Name=Parameter Name,m.Unit_Type=Unit Type,m.Range_Low=Range (Low Value),m.Range_High= Range (High Value) |where=pt.Name = '{{{Name}}}' |format=table }}

== Linked Solution Types ==

[{{fullurl:Form:Solution_Type }} Add Solution Type]


{{#cargo_query: tables=Solution_Type__Solves_Problem,Solution_Type |join on=Solution_Type__Solves_Problem._rowID=Solution_Type._ID |fields=Solution_Type._pageName=Name |where=Solution_Type__Solves_Problem._value="{{{Name}}}" |limit=3 |format=ul }} [[Category:Problem Type]]

{{#template_params:Solution Type|How this works|Region|Problems|Reference_URLs (label=References)}} {{#cargo_declare:_table=Solution|Solution_Type=Page|How_this_works=Wikitext|parentProblem=Integer|Problems=List (-) of String|Region=Text|country=Text|state=Text|city=Text|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL|coordinates=Coordinates}} {{#cargo_store:_table=Solution}} {{#template_display:_format=standard}}

Objectives:

{{#cargo_query:tables=Objective |fields=_pageName=Name |where=Objective.parent ='{{PAGEID}}' AND Objective.type= 'Solution' |format=ul |order by=_ID DESC }} '''Create a new Objective: '''. {{#forminput:form=Objective|link text=Create an Objective|query string=Objective[Title]={{{Title}}}&Objective[parent]={{PAGEID}}&Objective[type]=Solution|returnto={{PAGENAME}} }}

Action Items

  • {{#formredlink:form=Donation|existing page link text=Donate to Solution|target={{PAGENAME}}_Project_Donation|query string=Donation[Type]=Solution&Donation[Title]={{{Title}}}|link text=Donate to Solution}}
[[Category:Solution]]

<noinclude>
{{#template_params:Name|Solves Problem (label=Solves)|Same As|Measurement|Reference_URLs (label=References)}}
{{#cargo_declare:_table=Solution_Type|Name=String|Solves_Problem=List (,) of String|Same_As=Wikitext|Measurement=List (,) of String|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL}}
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#cargo_store:_table=Solution_Type}}
{{#template_display:_format=standard}}
[[Category:Solution Type]]
</includeonly>

{{#template_params:Problem|Solution|Region|Feature Image|Reference_URLs (label=References)}} {{#cargo_declare:_table=Project|Overview=Wikitext|Problem=List (-) of Page|Solution=List (-) of Page|Region=Page|Feature_Image=File|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL}} {{#cargo_store:_table=Project}} {{#template_display:_format=infobox}} {{#cargo_query: tables=Project |fields=Overview |format=standard |where=Project._pageID={{PAGEID}} }}

Objectives:

{{#cargo_query:tables=Objective |fields=_pageName=Name |where=Objective.parent ='{{PAGEID}}' AND Objective.type= 'Project' |format=ul |order by=_ID DESC }} '''Create a new Objective: '''. {{#forminput:form=Objective|link text=Create an Objective|query string=Objective[Title]={{{Title}}}&Objective[parent]={{PAGEID}}&Objective[type]=Project|returnto={{PAGENAME}} }}

Action Item

  • {{#formredlink:form=Donation|existing page link text=Donate to Problem|target={{PAGENAME}}_Project_Donation|query string=Donation[Type]=Project&Donation[Title]={{{Title}}}|link text=Donate to Project}}
[[Category:Project]]

<noinclude>
{{#template_params:Parameter Name|Unit Type|Range Low (label=Value Range (Low))|Range High (label=Value Range (High))|Same As|Reference_URLs (label=References)}}
{{#cargo_declare:_table=Measurement|Name=String|Parameter_Name=String|Unit_Type=String|Range_Low=Float|Range_High=Float|Same_As=List (,) of String|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL}}
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#cargo_store:_table=Measurement}}
{{#template_display:_format=standard}}
[[Category:Measurement]]
</includeonly>
